sentences.sContent: Female sheep produce one or two lambs at a time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Female sheep produce one or two lambs at a time.
sentences.sCn: 母羊一次生一至两头羊羔。

sentences.sContent: To be effective, your group should pursue only one objective at a time.
sentences.sContent_eng: To be effective, your group should pursue only one objective at a time.
sentences.sCn: 为了更有效的完成任务，你的团队应该一次只执行一个任务。

sentences.sContent: If you work on only a single iteration at a time, this is not an issue.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you work on only a single iteration at a time, this is not an issue.
sentences.sCn: 如果您一次只工作在一个迭代上的话，就不存在这个问题了。
